item.title: Preparations for Raichur Utsav under way
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Medical Education and Raichur district in-charge Sharan Prakash Patil and Minister for Minor Irrigation N.S. Boseraju, on Sunday, viewed a power point presentation to show the different programmes that are going to be organised during Raichur Utsav.
The Ministers invited elected representatives and officials to the district administrative auditorium in Raichur to view the presentation and discuss programmes related to Raichur Utsav scheduled to be held on the University of agricult...]]>
item.author: Authors
